New Records: Reynaldo Lopez set the lowest ERA in a season (minimum 130 IP) in Braves franchise history with a 2.00 ERA in 2024.
Comparison of lowest ERA in Braves history shows Lopez's 2.00 ERA as the third best, following Greg Maddux, Kris Medlen, and others.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves and Royals will play again on Sunday afternoon at 3:10 p.m. ET.
Others: Reynaldo Lopez's transition from reliever to starter and his impact on the Braves' bullpen.
